title: BridgIT, a new tool for orphan and novel enzyme reactions

title_detail.value: BridgIT, a new tool for orphan and novel enzyme reactions

summary: Chemical engineers have developed an online tool that can accurately assign genes and proteins to unknown 'orphan' reactions, which are a major headache for biotechnology, drug development, and even medicine.

summary_detail.value: Chemical engineers have developed an online tool that can accurately assign genes and proteins to unknown 'orphan' reactions, which are a major headache for biotechnology, drug development, and even medicine.
